descriptionHtml:
Added dragon runes to 3 of Nord hero weapons and glowmaps to all 5 of them.

Dragon Runes:
Battleaxe - KeiN JUN - War Kings
Greatsword - Bah Zul Zahkrii - lightning voice sword - Requested by Calemyr
Sword - Su Grah Dun - Air Battle Grace - Requested by manyusershavethenameiwant

Item codes:
Battleaxe: 68c79
Waraxe: 68c63
Greatsword: a3115
Sword: 68c7b
Bow: 68c57

Install:
1. Extract files to your skyrim folder
2. ????
3. Profit!!

Endorsements are very much appreciated
author: Kealen
